homing arrows, good idea, sorta like chain lightning, 'cept it woudn't chain.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Tom Tildrum 
  To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2003 12:03 PM
  Subject: [gladiator] Archers


  We should try not to "double up" abilities. "Ethereal
  arrow" copies "warp space" and "freeze arrow" copies
  the faerie ability. Maybe archers should be able to
  "snipe" enemies--for a large mana cost, an arrow would
  auto-target an enemy. No more launching ten thousand
  arrows to try to kill one enemy across the board!
    -Tevildo.
